iti17:1.1_0: For this was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti17:2.1_0: “Taking into account exterior factors, mendicants, I do not see a single one that is so very helpful as good friendship for a trainee mendicant who hasn’t achieved their heart’s desire, but lives aspiring to the supreme sanctuary.
iti17:2.2_0: A mendicant who has good friends gives up the unskillful and develops the skillful.”
iti17:4.1_0: That is what the Buddha has heard.
